author: ShadyTidus
install_msg:
Thanks for installing ShadyEvents!

Use `/tournament create` to start a tournament.
Supports solo and team tournaments with bracket generation.
Manage match results with `/tournament report`.
name: ShadyEvents
description: Comprehensive tournament system with solo/team support, random/premade team modes, pickup player pools, automatic bracket generation, match tracking, and result reporting. Perfect for organizing gaming tournaments across multiple titles.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for tournament participants, team rosters, match results, and tournament data. Data is retained for historical purposes.
